alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:40AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Jefferson and northeastern Lewis Counties through 645 AM EDT... At 539 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clayton, or 17 miles northwest of Watertown, moving east at 30 mph. Another strong thunderstorm was developing between Carthage and Natural Bridge. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Drum, Carthage, Clayton, Herrings, Redwood, Kring Point State Park, Wellesley Island State Park, Cedar Point State Park, Black River, Philadelphia, Brownville, Alexandria Bay, Theresa, Antwerp, Harrisville, Chaumont, Evans Mills, Deferiet, Three Mile Bay and Millen Bay. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 48 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
